details.validation: Address components automatically validated by Google Places API

activities.impact: High - Completes the Google Places integration pipeline

activities.description: Completed full address data pipeline from Google Places API to database storage

pipeline_flow: 1. User types address in GooglePlacesAutocomplete component
2. Google Places API provides structured address data
3. handlePlaceSelect updates formData with address components
4. Form submission includes address_components in propertyData
6. JSONB column stores complete structured address information
benefits: Future-ready for map integration and proximity search

technical_implementation.frontend: React components with Google Maps API integration
technical_implementation.backend: Supabase with JSONB column for flexible data storage
technical_implementation.api_integration: Google Places API with Nigeria-specific restrictions
technical_implementation.data_validation: Real-time address validation via Google services

production_readiness.error_handling: Graceful fallback to manual address input

activities.impact: Critical - System now has professional-grade address handling
